alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 5:28PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Brief Landspout Tornadoes Possible... At 526 PM MDT, conditions are becoming favorable for the development of landspout tornadoes in and close to the Cheyenne and Kit Carson County area. However, at this time it is unknown which if any storm would produce a landspout. Any tornadoes which develop are expected to pose a limited threat. Locations impacted include... Cheyenne Wells, Stratton, Flagler, Seibert, Bethune, Kit Carson and Vona. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Goodland. Landspout tornadoes can form with a developing thunderstorm before rain, hail, and even thunder is observed. Landspout tornadoes are not usually associated with a wall cloud and are often difficult to detect with weather radar. &&
